articles.title: Scientists Uncover Hidden Earthquake Threat Lurking Beneath Northern California’s Fault Zone - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: Tiny, nearly undetectable earthquakes beneath Northern California are offering scientists new insights into the complex tectonic processes at play in the region’s most dangerous fault zones.
